nodes.name: addProjectToInvestor

params.fundingCloseDate: The date until the goal needs to be reached
params.fundingGoal: The goal for the funding campain in Wei
params.projectDescription: The description of the new ProjectContract
params.projectName: The name of the new ProjectContract

addNewProject(string,string,uint256,uint.return: Returns true when the new ProjectContract was successfully created

params._fundingCloseDate: The date until the funding closes
params._goal: The goal in Wei for the ProjectContract
params._owner: The address of the owner of the ProjectContract the new investor has invested in
params._projectAddress: The address of the contract the investor has invested in
params._projectDescription: The Description of the ProjectContract the new investor has invested in
params._projectName: The Name of the ProjectContract the new investor has invested in
params.investor: The address of the new investor

getProjectByFounderForIndex(uint256).return: Address of the ProjectContract ownerAddress of the ProjectContractName of ProjectContractDescription of ProjectContractFunding goalFunding closeing Date

getProjectByInvestorForIndex(uint256).return: Address of the ProjectContract ownerAddress of the ProjectContractName of ProjectContractDescription of ProjectContractFunding goalFunding closeing Date

getProjectCountForFounder().return: Number of ProjectContracts owned by caller

getProjectCountForInvestor().return: Number of ProjectContracts invested in by caller

getProjects(uint256).return: Address of the ProjectContract ownerAddress of the ProjectContractName of ProjectContractDescription of ProjectContractFunding goalFunding closeing Date

addNewProject(string,string,uint256,uint.notice: This function add a new projectContract to the ProjectHubContract. The caller address becomes automaticly the owner of the new ProjectContract. The new ProjectContract is then added to the list of ProjectContracts inside the ProjectHubContract.

addProjectToInvestor(address,address,add.notice: This function is only used internally by the ProjectContract to inform the ProjectHubContract that a new investor has been added to a ProjectContract

getProjectByFounderForIndex(uint256).notice: This function returns a specific ProjectContract that is owner by caller, given an index. It is used in conjunction with getProjectCountForFounder() to retrive all avaiable ProjectContracs owned by caller. It throws exception if the index if larger then the list size.

getProjectByInvestorForIndex(uint256).notice: This function returns a specific ProjectContract that is invested in by caller, given an index. It is used in conjunction with getProjectCountForInvestor() to retrive all avaiable ProjectContracs invested in by caller. It throws exception if the index if larger then the list size.

getProjectCount().notice: This function returns the number of ProjectsContracts inside the Hub.

getProjectCountForFounder().notice: This function return the number of ProjectContracts the caller owns.

getProjectCountForInvestor().notice: This function return the number of ProjectContracts the caller has invested in.

getProjects(uint256).notice: This function returns a specific ProjectContract, given an index. It is used in conjunction with getProjectCount() to retrive all avaiable ProjectContracs. It throws exception if the index if larger then the list size.

userdoc.notice: The ProjectHubContracts acts as an hub for all other ProjectContracts that are concluded It saves the addresses of these contracts, as well as the creators and investors that have payed Ethereum to be part of the project
